name: Nova RCP
short_description: Tired of raising a prototype and then hearing that its going to be productive? Tired of huge meetings only to discuss "where to put this button"? Try Nova! No GUI framework to quarrel with, no persistence layer to debug - JUST-WRITE-THAT-MODEL. Period.
